lines.text: I don't know where I'd be without the church...
Remember the good old days, when you could just kill your parents and take their land?
Ryan, you are not going to believe this. We have no luck at all!
Does this have anything to do with the stick turning pink?
[After Carrie gets Curt a puppy to replace his dead dog]
How would you like it if your dad died and I went out and got you another old alcoholic?!
